title: WATCH: Philippe Coutinho's best Premier League goals for Liverpool
description: With Philippe Coutinho set to leave Liverpool for Barcelona, we take a look at some of his best Premier League goals for the Reds.
content: The Brazil international will finalise the deal this week with a medical and personal terms, but it is expected to go through for a fee Sky Sports News understands to be Â£146m.Three of his goals come from 2015, where he scored against Southampton, Manchester City and QPR and another two the year after against Arsenal and Hull.In April 2017, he scored a superb goal against Everton in the Merseyside derby, with two further goals coming this season against Leicester and Newcastle.Finally, there are two strikes from December 2017, when Coutinho scored against Bournemouth and Swansea to round off our countdown.Hit play on the video above to see the best Premier League strikes from Coutinho.
